Package gnu.mapping

Supports Procedure, and various related classes needed at run-time by dynamically types languages (such as Scheme and ECMAScript).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ApplyMethodContainer An object that may have methods that provide the "action" needed by an ApplyMethodProc.
CpsMethodContainer An object that may have methods that provide the "action" needed by an CpsMethodProc.
HasSetter A Procedure that can be used on the left-hand-side of an assignment.
Named  
Printable  
 

Class Summary
AliasConstraint The value field of a AliasConstraint points to another Binding.
ApplyMethodProc Call a specified method in in a ApplyMethodContainer.
Binding A Binding is a Location in an Environment object.
BindingEnumeration  
CallContext A procedure activation stack (when compiled with explicit stacks).
CallFrame A procedure activation frame (when compiled with explicit stacks).
CharArrayInPort An Inport for reading from a char array.
CharArrayOutPort Similar to CharArrayWriter.
ConstantConstraint A constraint for an immutable binding.
Constraint A Constraint is used to control the values in a Binding.
Continuation  
CpsMethodProc  
CpsProcedure  
Environment An environment contains (name->value) bindings.
FluidBinding Used for a stack of fluid bindings.
FluidConstraint This Constraint searches a thread's stack of FluidBindings.
Future  
IndirectConstraint  
InPort  
Location A Location is an abstract cell/location/variable with a value.
LogWriter A class that supports an optional log file that output is duplicated to.
MethodProc Similar to a CLOS method.
NameMap  
OutPort An extended PrintWriter.
Procedure The abstract parent for all Scheme functions.
Procedure0 Abstract class for 0-argument procedures.
Procedure0or1 Abstract class for 0- or 1-argument Scheme procedures.
Procedure1 Abstract class for 1-argument Scheme procedures.
Procedure1or2 Abstract class for 1- or 2-argument Scheme procedures.
Procedure2 Abstract class for 2-argument Scheme procedures.
Procedure3 Abstract class for 3-argument Scheme procedures..
Procedure4 Abstract class for 4-argument Scheme procedures.
ProcedureN Abstract class for "N-argument" Scheme procedures, where N>4 or variable.
ProcLocation  
PropertyConstraint The Constraint for a Binding that may have arbitrary associated properties.
Setter The "setter" of procedure that can be used in the LHS of an assignment.
Setter0 A special case of Setter, retricted to no arguments, except the RHS.
Setter1 A special case of Setter, retricted to one argument (plus the RHS).
SFormat A Format to print structured objects on streams.
SysInPort A class to compensate from System.in blocking other threads.
TrivialConstraint This is the default Constraint for a simple variable Binding.
TtyInPort An interactive input-port.
UnboundConstraint This is a constraint used to catch unbound variables.
Values Encapsulate multiple values in a single object.
ValueStack  
 

Exception Summary
UnboundSymbol  
WrappedException Encapsulate some Exception inside a RuntimeException.
WrongArguments  
WrongType  
 

Package gnu.mapping Description

Supports Procedure, and various related classes needed at run-time by dynamically types languages (such as Scheme and ECMAScript).

The exact set of classes in this package is still somewhat in flux.

License

See the file COPYING.

Author

Per Bothner <per@bothner.com>

Bugs and patches

Send them to per@bothner.com, or to the Kawa mailing list.
